Text:

Much appreciated... you are a master.  Should I be able to run battle.net with this?  It says my CD key is invalid.  I do have another CD key I can use, but do you have any ideas how I could change the key you provided?  Thanks again.
How long does the rebuilding usually take?

@howie1384: rebuilding took me no longer than 10 minutes.  then it will create shortcuts on your desktop and you're good to go. let me know if you have any trouble with battle.net as it tells me either my CD key is invalid or I am trying to connect to an invalid server
When I run the SETUP.bat file it just opens a window with music and a crazy dancer, i let it go for like an hour and nothing.  Am I doing something wrong?  I followed the instructions.
ditto howie1384

Did you disable UAC first?  The same thing happened to me until I disabled UAC (and restarted).  Then, the blue prompt screen will ask you to press enter to continue and everything is golden after that.
My UAC was off, and I even restarted again just to make sure.  Same thing, just the dumb dancer and music.
jeeeeez,,, when The Dancer appears.. just press (Esc) wow... lmao
well maybe I was just a retard, but I hit Esc and it worked perfectly.  Thanks for the great download blaze-69 and the help too.

I googled UAC and the first thing that came up was the answer.  User Account Control.  Then I typed in "how to turn off UAC windows 7"
